modName: Cleric Healing Division and Healing Cycle
summary: This mod adds two new powerful healing spells. Inspired by the Silkroad game's Europe class Cleric healing magic.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds two new powerful healing spells. Inspired by the Silkroad game's Europe class Cleric healing magic.
1. Cleric Healing Division
2. Cleric Healing Cycle
Ps. I tried making a chain effect for Healing Division, but ran into too much issues.

Description of Cleric Healing Division: Allies recover 100 points of health and magicka per second. Allies are gifted with 100 points of health and stamina as well. Concentration type spell. Similar to the Heal Hands spell.

Description of Cleric Healing Cycle: heal everyone close to the caster 250 points to health and stamina for 10 seconds. Similar to the grand healing spell. 

Both spell tomes can be found in the Temple of Mara in Riften.

Possible future plans:
- Add custom spell sounds from the game SilkroadR
author: Bronyphony
